duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests, provide outstanding guest service, and settle guest accounts upon completion of their stay.
Make and modify reservations, perform hotel operator and concierge duties.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming, and provide courteous assistance to guests.
Handle requests for information, mail, and messages in an efficient and courteous manner.
Answer guest inquiries about hotel services, facilities, hours of operation, and local area attractions.
Be aware of all rates, packages, special promotions, and closed out/restricted dates.
Obtain necessary information when taking room reservations and follow rate quoting scenarios.
Assist in emergency procedures, maintain an up-to-date knowledge of property amenities, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, customer service experience in a hotel or related field helpful.
